shadow.name: DISSATISFACTION
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of The Joyous, expressing through dissatisfaction

gift.name: VITALITY
gift.description: The gift frequency of The Joyous, expressing through vitality

siddhi.name: BLISS
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of The Joyous, expressing through bliss

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 58 shadow frequency. The dissatisfaction you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural vitality. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from dissatisfaction to vitality.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your root. Notice the sensation of dissatisfaction.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 58 consciously for 7 days, the dissatisfaction pattern will shift toward vitality.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 58 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from dissatisfaction toward vitality
